text: Catonephele orites, the orange-banded shoemaker butterfly, is a species of butterfly found throughout the northern coast of South America and into Central America. == Food == female Larvae of Catonephele orites have been found on Alchornea. == References == *Catonephele at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms Category:Biblidinae Category:Nymphalidae of South America Category:Butterflies described in 1899
title: Catonephele orites
